item.title: Flight Crew/Supernumerary Escape Devices – Escape Harnesses Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System Both Upper Deck Slides are Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided:

numlitem.para: Both Upper Deck Door/Slides are operative, and
Ensure flight crew and supernumeraries are briefed on the number of harnesses inoperative and emergency operation of Upper Deck Door/Slides.

placard.para: Placard below captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel stating: "____# ESCAPE HARNESS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove inoperative escape harness from stowage box.
